Hampton Products, founded in 1990, has a deep-seeded history of providing high-quality security and hardware products. Headquartered in Foothill Ranch, California, the company is a trusted industry leader.

April 25, 2025 - In 1999, Hilton acquired Promus Hotel Corporation, which included the DoubleTree, Red Lion, Embassy Suites, Hampton Inn, and Homewood Suites brands. The company spun off its international operations into a separately traded company on December 1, 1964, known as "Hilton International Co."
